inclusion.criterion: histologically proven primary malignancy of any histological type
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain corresponding to the area of bone metastasis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: a Karnofsky performance status of at least 40
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: an estimated life expectancy of at least 1 month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histologic diagnosis was established from needle biopsy, bone marrow biopsy, cytology, or a surgical biopsy or resection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Radiographic evidence of bone metastasis was required and performed within 8 weeks prior to randomization
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The patient was ineligible if the systemic agent commences within the 30 days prior to registration
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: This includes hormonal therapy, chemotherapy, and immunotherapy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN, and previous viral encephalitis/meningitis with mild non-focal residual deficits. However, they have histologically proven primary malignancy of Burkitt's lymphoma and radiographic evidence of bone metastasis.
